channel.title: How do I add a simple mute command?
channel.description:
Hi,
I want a simple mute, that when you type, ::mute playername, it will change muted to 1, and when your not muted it will change muted too 0.
Thanks,
I will need tokens I think.
Regards,
Musicmad

item.title: How do I add a simple mute command?
item.dc:creator: @musicmad441 Musicmad
item.description:
@musicmad441 wrote:

[quote=“BurnInSilence, post:11, topic:183283”][quote author=Musicmad link=topic=244963.msg2067555#msg2067555 date=1203548909]
Hi,

I want a simple mute, that when you type, ::mute playername, it will change muted to 1, and when your not muted it will change muted too 0.

Thanks,

I will need tokens I think.

Regards,

Musicmad
[/quote]
eh wtf?
you out of alot of people are the least id expect to ask people to make a command for you
especially as simple as this =[/quote]

I did attempt it, but I kept getting exceptions. I think it might be client sided.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I add a simple mute command?

item.title: How do I add a simple mute command?
item.dc:creator: @musicmad441 Musicmad
item.description:
@musicmad441 wrote:

[quote=“Loop, post:6, topic:183283”]to mute someone right click there name in chat and at end of the list of offence u wanna report you will see mute4 player click that and any offence and they will be muted

=D[/quote]

Does not work, because I changed the report abuse to my own.

Regards,

Musicmad

Read full topic

item.title: How do I add a simple mute command?
item.dc:creator: @musicmad441 Musicmad
item.description:
@musicmad441 wrote:

[quote=“trevor268, post:4, topic:183283”][quote author=Musicmad link=topic=244963.msg2067565#msg2067565 date=1203549093]

what source?

Should not make any difference, Czar anyway.

Regards,

Musicmad
[/quote]

well if your mod or higher you click report abuse then type in the players name then click the mute option and then click offensive language and they are muted, that is why i asked :)[/quote]

That does not work.

I want it like a command.

Regards,

Musicmad

Read full topic
